name: Star Wars: Yoda's Challenge Activity Center
summary:
A FORCE FOR YOUNG MINDS

Everyone has the innate desire to learn. Lucas Learning strives to nurture and strengthen this creative force during children's formative years by creating high-quality software products that engage them in meaningful exploration and discovery.

Lucas Learning Products place value on freedom, self-discovery and choice - not "the rules."

Unlike more traditional forms of learning, the Lucas Learning experience consists of kids doing, exploring, and creating. Learning takes place through interaction and direct experience, not simply by finding the "right answer."

Lucas Learning understands that this type of learning remains valuable throughout life. Kids know that this type of learning is more fun!
